post.body: sounds like fluff marketing to me
oh man, I'm so slow. I only just NOW got that joke about Georgia. *palm-head* doh!
go to http://www.blogger.com/home make sure you are logged in, then choose "Layout" for your your blog, then add a gadget!
re: cultural history recording, how do you figure? I'd say just the opposite! Far more of our cultural history is recorded than ever
Symbian fring does that sometimes, too. It's a known bug. :( And 40 sheqs/mo vs 95 sheqs/mo for the Nokia N95
also, I'm a weirdo who'd rather use an MID for all those phone-as-computer needs, so I'll put my fring on something like a Nokia N810
it had to do with cost. I could have a high quality camera in an expensive but good OS or in an obscure but cheap one. $ won out.
I hope they get better soon!!
I don't know. I'll ask when i'm at the fring office tomorrow.
twitter does that for all long addy's :)
that is indeed the one. :)
fring does work in the states. On supported phones that have the right network and/or wifi.
oops! I didn't go into the office at all this week, so I didn't ask. Sorry!!
Wow! Does it use a quantum probability engine? Or a time machine?
a Hebrew-language Amazon might kick the butts of Steimatzky and Tzomet Sfarim into having usable Websites at last.
yes, that fring.
as long as you have a dataplan on Tmobile in the US, fring should work fine. We have Tmobile users for sure.
hi! Isn't it the crack of dawn where you live?
SHOOT! And I just BOUGHT a new phone. *pout*
I use Ubuntu for my day-to-day development & testing, which is debianish. I used to always use Mandriva, which is redhattish.
not today, though. I'm swamped today. Working on a cool site with @ezrabutler :)
OK, I tell you what. I'll write a post about image manipulation in Gimp this week at http://theledgeofknow.blogspot.com OK?
ecstatic and shocked. I'm trying to figure out now how I can go visit the US in August or Sept to see them!!!
baby's due in early August.
@linuxlibrarian thanks!
YAY!!! You're HERE!!!!
I ask myself that question at nearly every conference I go to or watch via webcast...
what exactly is uxbookclubisrael???
people thought that I sang funny, but why? I didn't know any of the melodies. I'm an alto, so I only knew the harmonies!!
when I was in high school, i was in a non-Jewish choir for the first time ever. In Nov/Dec I constantly sang odd carols...
you are such a goofball!
I can blame anything I want on you. We're both US citizens. Free speech aplies. :-p
thanks. :)
try the Gimp http://gimp.org/ It's free, open and will handle nearly all your photoshopping needs
that last snurl you sent at 15:26 Israeli time went to an error on the jpost site...
I definitely see how your posts apply to my business. That's why I keep reading and recommending them!
in which time zone, is the question!
the best part of being self employed isn't that you get to work half-time, it's that you get to pick which 12 hrs a day to work!
it's not fair to take her away from HER parents!
has got some very wise words about helping injured vets with their lives back home http://bit.ly/osMG
in PT it's sunny and mild. TA's probably not much different.
thanks. :) Oh, and I'm glad to see that you got your normal twitter id back!!
weird! Glad to hear it's working now, though!!
at gmail I have a spam box full of spam, but getting spam in the inbox is really, really rare.
I nominate @artbyskym for a Shorty Award in #design because she's an awesome artist and needs more good stuff in her life!
I recommend Drupal with Ubercart http://drupal.org/project/ubercart
what am I missing? It looks all right to me! http://is.gd/bifU
I've been using google mail's contacts as my central repository for a while now. I sync it up in various ways as needed.
did it, @carpefactum did it. Now me... What do I believe?
Oo! I like the hat, man! :)
Yay! Isn't it great to have the big ones around?
not so much. He can't handle the chaos that is the Israeli classroom. :(
you should totally read @ezrabutler's http://bit.ly/wyFi
You have a great New Year, too!!
last year I saw the aftermath of a rocket close up a couple days after it landed in Shoqeda, but I wasn't there when it happened.
I've been fortunate enough to never be right where a rocket was. So, no, I haven't seen them come down.
Happy new year to you, in a few hours! :)
Don't you know what happens to Gazans who DON'T support Hamas now? They get killed! Want me to fetch the news reports for you?
absolutely. Because if you are sitting there thinking, "Why the hell is Israel bombing the sh-- out of Gaza?" That explains it
but understanding is not the same as accepting as an OK way for things to be.
but since they won the elections, they got power and their only interest was more power -- honestly? I can understand that, too.
Before they had the kind of power and control they have now, they weren't ONLY interested in destroying Israel.
I'm gonna put a .hosts redirect on my machine so that jpost.com = haaretz.com so I stop doing that!!!!
Ack! Why do I keep going back to jpost.com when I know it's going to crash my browser??!
I'm wondering how I should take care of my new phone... in a camera case? Is there a phone case for the LG KU990?
Just got an LG ku990 phone. More camera than phone, really. I like!
1 ripe avocado. 1 tbsp chpd fresh onion. 1/4 tsp crushed red pepper. juice of 1/2 lemon. 1 tooth garlic. salt 2 taste. blend. yum
I need to get out of here and get myself a new phone. I'm anxious about the phone thing. But I also want to finish my current task *sigh*
Another reason I love working from home: 9yo son just came home from school and showed me how he can turn his face red on demand (for fun)
Song break: Singing Sara Barreilles Love Song at the top of my lungs in my living room while coding. This is why I like to work at home! :)
Oh noes! The truth about the Obama "team" has come out!!!! http://happydog.livejournal.com/518480.html
Talking about Hapoel Ussishkin Basketball http://seesmic.com/videos/UZk2EhC8Fl
If you know of some Israeli political use of the 'Net that you think is top quality and/or innovative, share it!
So Israeli politicians are copy cats. We know that. But is anyone doing anything GOOD yet? http://www.haaretz.com/hasen/spages/1042667.html
Lazyweb time... is there a quick way to tweet stuff you like on last.fm?
He said, "Never. Israel is a tiny place and it's not worth the effort."
When I worked at Amazon.co.uk I asked the head of international when they were going to open an Israeli Amazon. (cont)
I need a laptop. I wanna go work in a cafe for a little bit, but I only have a desktop computer. *sigh* *wo is me* ;)
OK, on my way to fring. I have playing with my new friends all week,but there is an MID that needs fring and I'm the one to make it happen.
Music to work and play by. The channel chosen my by 9yo: http://tinyurl.com/5me4ph
http://twitpic.com/qkl2 - This is the original picture of youngest boy and middle girl
http://twitpic.com/qkks - taught my 9yo some image manipulation techniques last night. fun!
Another woman facing home loss. Please help if you can. http://community.livejournal.com/helpvera/751.html
(Yeah, I'm repeating myself because a couple people didn't believe the "it's not me" thing. Sheesh)
A long, long time ago I was the victim of domestic violence. Amazing people helped me out. Today I'm paying forward. So again, don't worry!!
In case anyone else finds themselves looking for the domestic violence hotline in Central Israel, it's 1800 220 000
Don't worry, i'm not the victim needing the help.
what resources are there 4 battered women in TA area? @lishevita me tnx
Told him, "It's not true.You just gotta know your wife. If she likes RAM, then that's the right gift. If she likes diamonds, dump her."
just saw http://bit.ly/WK7Z with my kid.
It took about 10 times as long to solve a problem in Plesk as it would have with shell access.
I officially hate working with Web hosts that give Plesk access and no ssh access. I needs me some shell, man!!!
Zis database, it doz not laik mi. Ai don no wai!!
(for those not in the know, "balagan"means something like confusion or mess in Hebrew)
little girl at my house playing legos with my son, "I don't put stuff away so much. I just make a lot a balagan" hehehe...
No, @artbyskym is NOT having a baby. I was just telling her that my eldest son's baby is due in August.
I'd better get some knitting skilz or something grandmotherly like that. Homemade Linux software isn't the best gift for a newborn.
I'm going to be a grandma!!!
I just got the news... In August I'm officially going to be an old woman.
it's 10:30 at night and I have SO much work to do before I can go to sleep. How am I ever going to get a normal sleep schedule again?
Ding! Dong! Ding! Dong! Ding! Dong! Ding! Dong! Merrily ring! Ding! Dong... Happy holidays!
oh, but before I do, a quick story.
finally off to bed... good night, world!
Look, ma! I'm dancing!! "one step forward, two steps back. one step forward, two steps back..."
wanna go to bed, but can't until I see this app upload finish. *yawn*
lazytweet does anyone know how to view JUST unread mail in gmail? I imagined #unread but that doesn't work.
I, for one, am quite certain that the Pirates would win. Arrr... http://bit.ly/CvGq
I totally have to get my eldest one of these so I can get lots of pictures and videos of the Bump http://bit.ly/HZcW
holy freaking cow. How difficult can it be to make an icon show up in the right place? Each of these devices are a little different. WHY??
More importantly, I'm too far away! I want to be able to PLAY with my grandbaby!!! sheesh!
I alwys knew I'd be a young grandma. no. 1 is old enough, mature enough, and has been w/ partner long enough, but still... I'm NOT old enuf!
Stayed up past 4am talking to no1 son then to friends here and then to my best friend in US. Got lil kid off to school at 8, then back 2 bed
wondering what question Iasked to make the @magic8bot tell me no. weirdness.
My day has not started well. I am NOT a happy girl. Can I go in a corner and cry now? No, I can't. Blah.
Oh, lovers of words and the stream of group conciousness, have you seen this? http://aqua.livejournal.ru/
Thanks @elibrody @wildernesscat @martinpolley for the is:unread trick for gmail search!!
When it comes to getting gifts for family in the US this season, I have the coolness advantage. All the presents I send come from Israel!!!
Crud! Google Chrome decided that I needed the Hebrew version based on location without bothering to ask. I want ENGLISH!!! WAAAAAAA!!!
Working in a cafe. Like a real digital nomad. Yay! Pictures of my new toy will be forthcoming, as soon as I get bluetooth working.
RT @math_puppy: ...the question posed in "Twinkle, Twinkle Little Star" is totally answered by They Might Be Giants' "The Sun is a Mass..."
A bit of Hathor: What would Thoreau do? http://bit.ly/tVPj
off to bed I go. @jeffpulver breakfast in TA in the morning. I have to look up the place on the map still. Is it on the 66 bus line, I hope?
I believe in hope, in love, in now, in the future, in the awesomeness of my children, and in the Oneness of us all.
The interview went really well, we got to play fun games, and I only stammered in Hebrew a little bit. :)
Had a totally awesome time with the Crictor crew at 3VGames tonight. http://www.3vgames.com
teaching my 9yo python while I work. Fun!
hmmmm... in a regular word processor (openoffice in my case) how do you type a number with a line over it? #lazytweet?
Back from meeting at my 9yo's school. It was positive, resulting in a useful plan of action. Shocker! Yay school psych & dist. consultant!
Good night all!!!
I've got a ton of things to do and a really long day tomorrow. What am I doing still up at 1:18am??
yo, @ezrabutler you catch that? I'm pimpin' your writin's to folks who lazytweet. Oh, yeah!
I am totally raising my kids wrong. Isn't it great?

A long and overdue post on the Israeli operation in Gaza at Streaming Israel http://www.streamingisrael.com/node/36 #gaza #israel
I'm feeling rotten, rotten still. I think I used up my daily allotment of energy while sick. Back to bed...
When newspapers quote the casualties on each side, they count them from the day that Israel started bombing, not when Hamas started 10y ago.
When I say "down" I mean, they replaced the sites with pro-Hamas propaganda. lovely. #gaza
Pro-Hamas hackers are attacking Israeli sites today. YnetNews went down, Bank DIscount went down. What other sites?
Looks like I tweet a lot about work and Israel. But my 9yo makes a respectable appearance. :) http://tinyurl.com/8nab6m
Happy, safe, prosperous and PEACEFUL 2009 to all!! #newyears
One misconception is that most of the Jews came to #Israel from Europe. Actually, the majority of Israeli Jews came from Arab countries.
Oh, hey, by the way... It just turned into 2009 here! Happy New Year!! :) Here's hoping for peace and SOON!
